descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/20LVUry.jpg[/IMG]

Third in my series of Dark Cloud weapons.

The Sun Sword was one of the most memorable weapons from the game. To get it, you had to complete Toto\'s house, and then watch the cutscene where Gosuke dies, and the sword is retrieved from his body.

Hopefully fellow Dark Cloud players can enjoy this mod!

It is found Nchuand-Zel Excavation site, which means you must travel to Markarth in order to retrieve this legendary weapon!
author: halex1316
